frontmatter.title: Job of a DataScientist: Separating Signal from Noise. Machine Learning Under the Hood
frontmatter.short: The job of a datascientist is to separate signal from noise. Signal represents valuable consistent relationships that we want to learn. Noise is the random correlations and stuff that will not occur again in the future.
